steps: 1. Remove the solidified sample from the crucible. 2. Use a diamond saw or a band saw to cut the sample to the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches. 3. Sand the edges to achieve a smooth finish. 4. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance durability.
